duties_responsibilities.duty: Accomplish raising, positioning, aligning, and connecting columns, beams, and other structural members to complete structural framing.
Rigging signaling and bolt up structural members. Ability to read erection and shop drawings. Fabricate structural members in the field and install stairs, guardrails, and grab rails.

Use gridlines and benchmarks to complete layout. Comfortable with heights, fall protection, and safety equipment knowledge. Signaling crane, connecting steel, operating powered hand tools, forklifts, and aerial working platforms.
Maintain safety 100% of the time and enforce required PPE for all team members. Have the knowledge to do the job.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GED. OSHA 10 preferred. Pass pre-employment drug screen.
